ui_surfaces.navigation_path: Main Menu > Profiler > Collectors > SSH Collector

inputs.name: SSH Server Address
inputs.help_text: Enter the IP address or hostname of the SSH server.

inputs.name: Port
inputs.help_text: Specify the port number for the SSH connection.

inputs.name: Authentication Method
inputs.help_text: Select the authentication method for the SSH connection.

inputs.name: Username
inputs.help_text: Enter the username for SSH authentication.

inputs.name: Password
inputs.help_text: Enter the password for SSH authentication (if using Password method).

inputs.name: Private Key
inputs.help_text: Provide the path to the private key file (if using Public Key method).

actions.description: Tests the connection to the configured SSH server.

constraints.constraint: SSH Server Address must be a valid IP address or hostname.
Port must be an integer between 1 and 65535.
Authentication Method must be either Password or Public Key.

errors.description: Failed to connect to the SSH server. Verify the server address, port, and authentication details.
Authentication failed. Check the username, password, or private key.

steps: Navigate to Main Menu > Profiler > Collectors.
Enter the SSH Server Address, Port, and Authentication Method.
Provide Username and Password or Private Key based on the selected Authentication Method.
Click 'Test Connection' to verify the configuration.
Click 'Save Configuration' to apply the settings.
workflows.visual_representation: Not available in the provided documentation.
